alert.note: Alert for Gage; Johnson; Nemaha; Otoe; Pawnee; Richardson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 9:27AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Johnson, Nemaha, southeastern Otoe, northwestern Richardson, northern Pawnee and northeastern Gage Counties through 1000 AM CDT... At 927 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles southeast of Nebraska City to 4 miles west of Johnson to 3 miles northwest of Filley. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree branches and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Tecumseh, Brock and Julian around 930 AM CDT. Johnson around 935 AM CDT. Peru and Lewiston around 945 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Brownville and Burchard. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Gage; Johnson; Nemaha; Otoe; Pawnee; Richardson
